name: Fleshpod Hornet
description: The Fleshpod Hornet is a large creature characterized by its impressive agility and potent attacks, featuring a nasty stinger capable of inflicting poison and creating tumors in its victims.
memorable: Notable for its ability to inject eggs that create a tumor, leading to further threats when young hornets erupt from it.
goals: To ambush and inflict poison damage on its prey.
relations: Might be encountered near other poisonous or aggressive creatures.
environment: Typically found in forest or jungle habitats.
strengths: Noteworthy for its high Dexterity, enabling exceptional maneuverability and speed in combat.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit its strategic actions and social interactions.
attacks: Uses a multiattack of slam and stinger, capable of bludgeoning and piercing damage along with poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: The Stinger attack not only deals significant poison damage but also infects targets with debilitating eggs.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 14, allowing it to effectively detect hidden enemies or traps.
skills: Proficient in Perception, gaining a +4 bonus to perception checks.
additional_information: Flying Charge ability can knock targets prone for advantageous attacks.
The tumor caused by the stinger hinders skill checks and saving throws.
Can produce young Fleshpod Hornets from infected hosts after 24 hours.
Requires a specific Medicine check to safely remove its tumor.
Has a flying speed of 60 feet, very agile in combat.

flying beast with debilitating stinger attack
hornet that creates tumors with injected eggs
agile creature inflicts long-lasting poison damage
hornet with a charge ability that knocks down
